meanings.definition: The quality or state of being fey.
meanings.sent1: Her feynesses were evident in her dreamy gaze.
meanings.sent2: The feynesses of the forest creatures added to the magical atmosphere.
meanings.sent3: The feynesses of the old house made it seem like it was alive.
meanings.sent4: The feynesses of the mist gave it an ethereal quality.
meanings.sent5: The feynesses of the music transported me to another world.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of having a supernatural or otherworldly appearance or aura.
meanings.sent1: The mysterious figure had an undeniable air of feynesses.
meanings.sent2: The painting captured the feynesses of the ghostly figure perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The costume party was filled with feynesses and magic.
meanings.sent4: The feynesses of the moonlit night made it feel like a fairy tale.
meanings.sent5: The feynesses of the fog created an eerie and mystical atmosphere.
